name: ScriptureChase
0:
”Alexa start scripture chase”
”My answer is one”
”exit skill”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scripture chase
des:
This game has 100 hints for the scripture mastery scripture for seminary in the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. The game gives you a hint and then lists out four possible answers, you then can pick a number that corresponds with what you think the correct answer is.

My husband and I have also created individual games for the Book of Mormon, D&C, Old Testament, and New Testament, this skill combines the 4 into one to allow you to practice and test your knowledge of the scriptures.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
